nodes.text: Lila Nervi was a female individual of the influential Nervi family who married Ralchio Sargan, allowing Ralchio to enroll in the Rengali Imperial Naval Academy and become a lieutenant in the Galactic Empire's 14th Sector Fleet. In part due to Lila's lobbying, Ralchio was promoted to the rank of captain and became the commanding officer of his own task force after coming to the attention of Grand Moff Ravik.
